title: What makes this project unique?
description: This project stands out due to its innovative design and user-friendly interface.

title: What challenges were faced during development?
description: Some challenges included optimizing performance and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

title: How does the project handle user authentication?
description: User authentication is handled using secure JWT tokens, ensuring user data is protected.

title: What technologies were used?
description: The project is built using React, Node.js, and MongoDB for a full-stack development experience.

title: How does the project ensure data security?
description: Data security is ensured through encryption, secure APIs, and regular security audits.
